column1: We went to a clump of bushes
column2: and Tom made everybody swear to keep the secret
column3: and then showed them a hole in the hill
column4: right in the thickest part of the bushes. Then we lit the candles
column5: and crawled in on our hands and knees. We went about two hundred yards
column6: and then the cave opened up. Tom poked about amongst the passages
column7: and pretty soon ducked under a wall where you wouldn't a noticed that there was a hole. We went along a narrow place and got into a kind of room
column8: all damp and sweaty and cold
column9: and there we stopped. Tom says:"Now
column10: we'll start this band of robbers and call it Tom Sawyer's Gang. Everybody that wants to join has got to take an oath
column11: and write his name in blood."Everybody was willing. So Tom got out a sheet of paper that he had wrote the oath on
